name: Meal Prep Focus
title: Meal Prep Focus
description: Tailored to your health goals and preferences

meals.description: High-protein pancakes that reheat perfectly for busy mornings
instructions: Blend oats, protein powder, egg whites, banana, and baking powder until smooth
Heat non-stick pan over medium heat and spray with cooking spray
Pour batter to make 4 pancakes, cook 2-3 minutes per side
Store in refrigerator with parchment between layers
To reheat: microwave 30-45 seconds or toast lightly
meals.goal_alignment: High protein keeps you full while managing calories for weight loss

meals.description: Perfectly portioned meal prep bowls with lean protein and vegetables
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package directions (makes 5 servings)
Season chicken with garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper
Heat olive oil in large skillet, cook chicken 6-7 minutes per side
Steam broccoli and bell peppers until tender-crisp
Slice chicken and portion into meal prep containers with rice and vegetables
Store in refrigerator up to 4 days, microwave 1-2 minutes to reheat
meals.goal_alignment: Balanced macros with lean protein for muscle maintenance during weight loss

meals.food_name: Sheet Pan Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
meals.description: One-pan meal that's perfect for batch cooking and reheating
instructions: Cut sweet potato into cubes, zucchini into rounds, trim asparagus
Toss vegetables with half the olive oil, salt, and pepper
Arrange on sheet pan and roast 15 minutes
Season salmon with remaining oil, lemon juice, dill, salt, and pepper
Add salmon to pan, roast additional 12-15 minutes until fish flakes easily
Store portions in containers up to 3 days, reheat gently in microwave
meals.goal_alignment: Omega-3 rich salmon supports metabolism while vegetables provide fiber for satiety

days.day_notes: Prep day - make large batches of each meal for the week. All meals store well and reheat easily.

variety_score: Excellent variety with different protein sources (whey, chicken, salmon) and cooking methods (blending, sautéing, roasting)
goal_alignment: This meal prep plan supports weight loss through controlled portions, high protein for satiety, and balanced macros. Each meal is designed for easy batch preparation and reheating throughout the week.
shopping_tips: Buy ingredients in bulk for multiple servings. Invest in quality meal prep containers with tight-fitting lids. Shop for proteins on sale and freeze portions. Pre-wash and chop vegetables on prep day for maximum efficiency.
